notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.
ariaShowSolution: Show the solution. You will be provided with a sample solution.
ariaRetry: Retry the task. You can improve your previous answer if the author allowed that.
taskDescription:
Given the two algebraic expressions <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>8</mn>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mi>x</mi>
      <mn>2</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>9</mn>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mn>6</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">8{x^2}-9x + 6</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>6</mn>
  <mi>x</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">6x</annotation></semantics></math>, the solution is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mi>x</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>1.5</mn>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>1</mn>
    <mi>x</mi>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">3x-1.5 + \frac{1}{x}</annotation></semantics></math>. What mathematical operation was performed on the two algebraic expressions?
